Package movieassignment

Class Booking

java.lang.Object
movieassignment.Booking
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Booking extends Object implements Serializable
This class creates booking for the movie goer ticket
Author:
Lin Da wei, Jarel Tan Zhi Wen, Lui Shi Ying, Solomon Duke Tneo Yruan Rui, Wong Yi Xian

  • Constructor Details

    • Booking

      public Booking(Cinema cinema, MovieTiming timing, TicketBuyer buyer, int row, int col, Cineplex cineplex) throws Exception
      This constructor creates a booking
      Parameters:
      cinema - cinema of the booking
      timing - movietiming of the booking
      buyer - Ticketbuyer object contain buyer details
      row - row of the seat
      col - column of the seat
      cineplex - cineplex location
      Throws:
      EOFException - if binary file is empty
      FileNotFoundException - if binary file cannot be created or edited
      Exception
